sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOLINGEN, a town of the Prussian government of Cleves, the capital of a circle of the same name. It has been long celebrated for the excellent temper of the sword blades and other cutting instruments fabricated in the town and district. The circle is small, including only forty-two square miles, but it contains 28,500 inhabitants, of whom about four thousand reside within the town. Lat. 51.12.31. Long. 7. 2. 20. E.
